entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
